headline: My onion on the current discourse

markdown.content: Of course, at a time like this, it's important to acknowledge that whoever you are, your experience of the world is not always the same as that of other people. The staff here at Cohost have a certain point of view, and it's up to you not necessarily to agree with it, but to come to a point of understanding with it. Many of us have had unfortunate things happen to us and no doubt every one of us has done things which they regret.

Most importantly, though, I think we need to grow to understand each other and let this be a learning opportunity for all of us in the Cohost community, whether you signed up last week or have been here from the beginning. Remember that not everyone has the context that you might have on subjects such as these.
What we need most right now is big paws and a long tail, and cat ears. um, at least, that's what i need most right now.
meow meow meow meow im a cat :3
umm im gay. i like boys,, and girls,,, and enbies!!!
